message:
Fix timeline empty state and increase image generation timeout

Frontend changes:
- Increase API polling timeout from 30s to 2 minutes (accommodate China network latency)
- Add generateDailyPicture API function
- Remove timeline empty state check (always show timeline structure)
- Rename "Collections" to "Timeline" in navigation
- Fix TypeScript errors (date formatting, unused variables, type assertions)
- Rename "Analysis" tab to "Reflections"

Backend changes:
- Add retry logic for image generation (3 attempts with 60s/90s/120s timeouts)
- Total backend timeout: up to 270 seconds
- Handles intermittent API slowness from Beijing server location

Root cause: Server in Beijing experiences 5.4x slower API responses (87s vs 16s locally)
due to Great Firewall latency when calling international image generation APIs.
